translations.translation: So We opened the gates of heaven with torrential water
And We opened up the flood gates of the sky with water pouring down in torrents,
Thereupon We opened the gates of the sky for water to pour down,
We opened the gates of the sky and water started to pour down.
We therefore opened the gates of heaven, with water flowing furiously.
So, We opened the gates of the heaven with water Munhamir.
So We opened the gates of the cloud with water pouring
Then We opened the gates of heaven unto water torrential,
Then opened We the gates of heaven with pouring water
So We opened the gates of the sky with water pouring down in torrents,
Then We opened the portals of heaven with water poured out.
Then We opened the gates of the sky with pouring waters,
So We opened the gates of heaven, with water pouring forth.
So We opened the gates of heaven with water pouring forth.
We opened the Gates of Heaven with torrential water
So We opened the floodgates of heaven with water pouring down.
Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
[54:11] Then We opened (read fa-fatahnā or fa-fattahnā) the gates of the heaven with torrential waters, [waters] pouring down intensely,
(Then opened We the gates of heaven) for 40 days (with pouring water) with pouring rain.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما قنط، وبلغ الزجر غايته تضرع نحونا، مشتكياً من قومه { فَفَتَحْنَآ } لانتقامهم وهلاكهم { أَبْوَابَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ } [القمر: 11] منصب، كأنه يجري من جانب السماء

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ ففتحنا أبوابَ السماء بما منهمرٍ } منصب بكثرة وتتابع لم ينقطع أربعين يوماً، قال يمان: حتى طبق بين السماء والأرض، وقيل: كانوا يطلبون المطر سنين، فأُهلكوا بمطلوبهم
 وفتح الأبواب كناية عن كثرة الأمطار، وشدة إنصابها، وقيل: كان في السماء يومئذ أبواب حقيقة
